name: Red Ticking Velveteen Bunny
description:
{ S P E C I A L . E D I T I O N }
Miss Bunny for Holiday 2013

A perfectly proper velveteen bunny. Sweetly dressed in her Christmas frock & little silk shoes...she's just charming and will surely delight your little beauty.

{ d e t a i l s }
. ivory cotton velveteen body + gray silky ears
. red ticking stripe dress with peek-a-boo petticoat at hem
. black dupioni silk shoes
. dress & shoes fasten with snaps (easy for little hands)
. silk ribbon eyes...did you see my fluffy silk tail?
. size { l a r g e} is 18" 

{ l e a d . t i m e + s h i p p i n g }
Ready to ship in 3 - 5 business days. If you have any questions about current lead times, please feel free to contact me...these girls are available in time for Christmas...but not for long!

name: Gift Certificate
Holiday Gentleman Bunny
description:
The perfect gentleman. Made from luxurious & pure fabrics. This is the large 18" size.

{ d e t a i l s }
. fawn velveteen
. cotton/silk fabric lined ears
. linen suiting bow tie + trousers
. french ribbon suspenders
. silk ribbon eyes + tail...did you notice how my trousers accommodate my fluffy tail so well?
. size { l a r g e } is 18" 

May not be suitable for children under 3.

{ l e a d . t i m e + s h i p p i n g }
Ready to ship in 1 - 3 business days.

name: Eliza Bosom Doll in red ticking
description:
{ B o s o m : } "the area enclosed as by an embrace, to enclose or carry in the bosom; to keep with care; to take to heart; to cherish."

{ L a r g e . 2 1" . S i z e } 
This is the perfect doll for loving & proper frolicking. She is able to readily handle all the love & play a little girl will bring! They can have tea, play in the garden or even enjoy a nap.

{ E l i z a }
Eliza has a beautiful innocence & purity about her...she is so lovely with her golden crown braid, jadeite green eyes & sweet pink lip. 

{ d e t a i l s }
. linen body
. hand embroidered face & dupioni silk hair
. red ticking stripe dress
. red silk + ticking bonnet with European trim
. white batiste peek-a-boo petticoat
. white batiste bloomers, trimmed with cluny lace & tied with an ivory silk ribbon
. ivory linen apron with cherry trim
. black dupioni silk flats
. size { l a r g e } is 21"
. glass buttons at shoulders and seamed legs {for moveable joints & sitting...which is what makes it fun...due to the button shoulders she may not be appropriate for children under three years of age.}

* The sweet pea dress photographed is listed separately in case your little beauty needs both!

{ l e a d . t i m e + s h i p p i n g }
Ready to ship in 3 - 5 business days. If you have any questions about current lead times, please feel free to contact me...these girls are still available in time for Christmas...but not for long!

name: Sweet Pea Frock
description:
Just in case your Bosom dolly would like a additional frock. Made from one of my most favorite vintage feed sacks which features the most perfectly perfect sweet peas. 

{ d e t a i l s }
. vintage feed sack dress, lined with white batiste
. closes with 3 snaps down back

* Hickety Pickety & Kitty (the lovely + sassy hens) are listed separately 

{ l e a d . t i m e + s h i p p i n g }
Made to order. Please allow 3-5 business days for your dress to be made and shipped. If you need it sooner, please contact me as I usually have no problem expediting an order.

name: The Patsy Dress
description:
The Patsy dress is a darling classic. Truly a dress for proper frolicking...complete with full skirt, peter pan collar & glass buttons down the back. It is fully lined with cotton sateen, and constructed with couture sewing techniques for the highest quality of perfection and beauty. 

{ d e t a i l s }
. green cotton sateen
. cotton sateen lining in white with peek-a-boo petticoat detail
. italian glass buttons down back 

{ l e a d . t i m e + s h i p p i n g }
Size 3 is available for immediate shipment. Please contact me to order another size.

name: A Bespoke Beauty
description:
Inspired by my three little girls & the desire to make them a truly beautiful, heirloom quality, vintage inspired rag doll.

{ V i o l e t }
...the blonde...has a feed sack inspired cotton print dress with a scalloped hem, cream batiste pettie pants (that's what my grandma always called them & she wore them everyday), brown silk flats, a golden crown braid, blue eyes and a sweet pink lip.

{ d e t a i l s }
. linen body
. hand embroidered face & hand sewn yarn hair
. size { s m a l l } is 15"
. glass buttons at shoulders and seamed legs for moveable joints & sitting, which is what makes it fun.
. due to the button shoulders she may not be appropriate for children under three years of age.

{ l e a d . t i m e + s h i p p i n g }
Made to order. Please allow 2 - 4 weeks for her to be made and shipped. If you need her sooner, please contact me & I will do my best to accommodate you.

name: A Silk Hen
description:
We thought the Bosom Dolls needed some hens of their own...here they are! Our kids love our chickens so much, they think it's too fun for their dollies to enjoy theirs as well...Choose from Hickety Pickety (black) or Kitty (brown).

{ d e t a i l s }
. dupioni silk body
. velveteen beak
. slik eyes & comb
. hand embroidered (did you see their puffy cheeks?)

{ l e a d . t i m e + s h i p p i n g }
Made to order. Your hen will ship in 3-5 days, unless she has to wait for her Bosom Doll friend to be made of course.
